description.english: Started playing Season One.
description.japanese: Ｄ４を開始した。

description.german: Season 1 begonnen.
description.portuguese: Começou a jogar a Temporada 1.

description.english: Completed the Prologue tutorial.
description.japanese: プロローグのチュートリアルをクリアした。

description.portuguese: Terminou o tutorial do prólogo.
description.spanish: Has terminado el tutorial del prólogo.
description.german: Das Prolog-Tutorial abgeschlossen.

description.english: Completed the stunt scene with Amanada in the Prologue.
description.japanese: プロローグのアマンダとのスタントシーンをクリアした。
description.french: Vous avez terminé la scène de cascade du prologue avec Amanda.

description.spanish: Has terminado la escena de acción con Amanda del prólogo.
description.german: Die Stuntszene mit Amanda im Prolog abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato la sequenza acrobatica con Amanda nel Prologo.

description.english: Completed the stunt scene with Amanda in the Prologue without any MISS or POOR ratings.
description.japanese: プロローグのアマンダとのスタントシーンをMISS/POOR無しでクリアした。
description.french: Vous avez terminé la scène de cascade du prologue avec Amanda sans Raté ni Médiocre.
description.portuguese: Terminou a cena de acrobacia com Amanda no Prólogo sem nenhuma avaliação ERROU ou RUIM.
description.spanish: Has terminado la escena de acción con Amanda del prólogo sin fallar ni hacerlo mal.
description.german: Die Stuntszene mit Amanda im Prolog ohne ein "VERFEHLT" oder "SCHLECHT" abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato la sequenza acrobatica con Amanda nel Prologo senza ottenere né MANCATO né SCARSO.

description.english: Completed the stunt scene with Amanda in the Prologue with a 75% stunt Synchro Rate.

description.italian: Hai completato la sequenza acrobatica con Amanda nel Prologo ottenendo il 75% di Sincronizz.

description.english: Experienced all of Little Peggy memories.

description.english: Read all of the Fortune Cookie fortunes.

description.english: Entered the shop at home and during a Dive.

description.french: Vous avez accédé à la boutique chez vous et pendant une plongée.
description.italian: Sei entrato nel negozio a casa e durante un tuffo.
description.spanish: Has entrado en la tienda desde la casa y durante una inmersión.
description.japanese: 自宅とダイヴ先でショップに入った。
description.portuguese: Entrou na loja em casa e durante um mergulho.

description.english: Angered Olivia in the cargo container.
description.japanese: カーゴのコンテナ区画でオリビアを怒らせた。
description.french: Vous avez mis Olivia en colère dans la soute.
description.portuguese: Deixou Olivia com raiva no contêiner de carga.
description.spanish: Has enfadado a Olivia en la bodega.
description.german: Olivia im Frachtraum geärgert.
description.italian: Hai fatto arrabbiare Olivia nella stiva dell'aereo.

description.english: Pushed all of the animals (owl, squirrel, pigeon, dog, octopus, pig, and chicken).
description.japanese: 全種類の動物を押した。（フクロウ、リス、ハト、イヌ、タコ、ブタ、ニワトリ）
description.french: Vous avez poussé tous les animaux(hibou, écureuil, pigeon, chien, pieuvre, cochon, poulet).
description.portuguese: Empurrou todos os animais(coruja, esquilo, pombo, cachorro, polvo, porco e galinha).
description.spanish: Has empujado a los animales: búho, ardilla, paloma, murciélago, ratón, perro, pulpo, cerdo y pollo.
description.german: Alle Tiere gedrückt.(Eule, Eichhörnchen, Taube, Hund, Krake, Schwein, Huhn)
description.italian: Hai spinto tutti gli animali(gufo, scoiattolo, piccione, cane, piovra, maiale, pollo).
